plays.text: Penalty to Shawn Bates 2 minutes for Charging Bobby Holik
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Tripping Vladimir Malakhov
Penalty to Eric Lindros 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Jason Blake
Goal scored by Dave Scatchard assisted by Jason Blake and Jason Wiemer
Penalty to Roman Hamrlik 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Lindros
Penalty to Matthew Barnaby 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Garth Snow
Penalty to Alexei Kovalev 2 minutes for Roughing Brad Isbister
Penalty to Brad Isbister 2 minutes for Roughing Alexei Kovalev
Penalty to Oleg Kvasha 2 minutes for Holding Pavel Bure
Penalty to Sven Butenschon 2 minutes for Tripping Alexei Kovalev
Goal scored by Brian Leetch unassisted
